questionTexts.text: How well do we understand what your company actually needs from us?

questionTexts.placeholder: e.g. Scrum Master, DevOps consulting, App development, Agile Coaching, ...

questionTexts.text: What are the essentials we have to deliver?
questionTexts.placeholder: e.g. Scrum Master, DevOps consulting, App development, Agile Coaching, ...

questionTexts.text: What should we deliver more of?
questionTexts.help: From what do you want more of?

questionTexts.text: What should we avoid to do in the future?
questionTexts.help: What don't you need? Where do we err? What should we stop?
What excites you? How could our competencies assist you further?

questionTexts.text: What competencies and abilities should we acquire?
questionTexts.help: What do you need from us that we are missing so far?

questionTexts.text: How likely is it that you would recommend our company/product to a friend or colleague?
